title: SmartPlay
excerpt: Offline, personalized playlist generation which uses MFCC audio features of a song to get the mood of the song using a pretrained model to enqueue it in Now Playing list.

title: TraKinesics
excerpt: Manoeuvre screen-pointer using image processing techniques on hand-gestures from a webcam feed.

title: OCR
excerpt: Handwritten digits recognition using Back-propagation in a Multi-layer perceptron on MNIST dataset.

title: AndriodDJ
excerpt: Android app for creating a shared playlist for a DJ party, with functionalities like upvote/downvote, streaming from YouTube etc using a peer-to-peer network like Wi-Fi Direct.

title: Lost & Found
excerpt: Intranet portal for institute students to post lost/found items with indexed searching.

title: Sudoku Solver
excerpt: Solve Sudoku puzzles using constraint satisfaction, and Boolean satisfiability for conjunctive normal form (CNF).

title: Private IaaS Cloud
excerpt: Designed an IaaS (Infrastructure as a Service) cloud to dispense and monitor virtual machines using VirtualBox as the hypervisor.

title: Board visibility detector
excerpt: Detect low visibility of text on blackboard using an ad-hoc network of Intel Edisons and an Android smartphone.

title: Amazon Price Tracker
excerpt: Analyse price trends of any product on Amazon to decide best time to buy it.

title: AmazonS4
excerpt: Using RSA-AES to encrypt files/folders before synchronously transferring them to Amazon S3 bucket.

title: Auto-SMS reporter
excerpt: Get SMS updates and booking details (about rail PNR or similar bookings) by sending booking id sms to a particular device.

title: Relational Algebra interpreter
excerpt: Parse a relational algebra expression to generate a corresponding SQL query with proper syntax.

title: LISP interpreter
excerpt: An interpreter for list based programming language like LISP in C++ using generalized Linked Lists
